name: Well, That Sucks. Demo
description:
Notice: Only slime world is active, it is a demo.

use bluetooth controller with xbox xbya layout.

x - attack

a - accept

b - back

left stick - move

right stick (use both at same time) - run

if you don't have a controller, you can use the keyboard:

wasd - left stick

jkil - right stick

e - a

q - b

space - x
